Dunno if your game has a bug, or quest, or whether I have just missed something, but I ran into problems:

> up
You are on the Ship Bow.
You can see a port cannon, a starboard cannon and cannon balls.
You can go down or south.
There is a staircase leading down below deck and a cannon on either side of the ship. A stack of cannon balls stands ready.

> look at starboard cannon
a metal tube used for propelling spherical ammunition at dangerous speeds

> look at cannon balls
balls of steel

> put cannon ball in starboard cannon
You are not carrying it.

> take cannon balls
You can't take it.

> go south
You can't go there.

> down
You can't go there.

> talk to monkey
The monkey says,"After you know where you want to go TAKE HELM to get this ship moving!"

> look at port cannon
I can't see that.

> look at starboard cannon
I can't see that.
